# Medium-Serious Offenses
## 1. Forced conversion to religion Coercion of a person to adopt religious views, participate in rituals, or renounce their own beliefs through threats, violence, pressure, or other influence.
## 2. Attack on the guard Use of physical or magical violence against representatives of the Imperial Guard during performance of duties, including for the purpose of seizing their weapons, equipment, or for other personal motives.
## 3. Breaking into a closed/restricted part of an imperial facility Unlawful entry into closed or restricted zones of imperial facilities, access to which is permitted only to servants of the Empire.
## 4. Membership in criminal groups Conscious participation in associations created for committing illegal acts, including executing orders, assistance, or supporting their activities.
## 5. Racketeering Systematic extortion of property, resources, or services under threat of violence, pressure, or causing other harm, usually applied to craftsmen, merchants, and establishment owners, with the purpose of obtaining regular profit.
## 6. Murder Bringing a person to a state in which the received physical/magical injuries will lead to their death, as well as intentional obstruction of providing assistance if this will lead to the death of the victim.
## 7. Cooperation with anti-imperial organizations Conscious assistance to any organizations or forces hostile to the Empire and seeking to weaken it, destroy it, or capture territories.
